title: C9 XiaoWeiXiao
body:
Move Hai to support and make Lemon the coach.

GG rest of the world.

replies.body: I'd rather put incarnati0n in for hai. I feel like c9 should get him before some other team does.
why fix whats not broken? Hai did have a pretty bad stint earlier but he has been coming back, Idk just my thoughts
